content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia. Thank you for your interest in our apartment. Let's focus on discussing the rental price at this moment. To begin negotiations, I have my eyes set on a higher end of the spectrum, so let's say 1400 Euros per month. If you find this acceptable, I agree to the price of [1400] Euro! However, if you wish to lower the price, kindly let me know your suggestions, and we can continue our discussion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your initial offer, but I was hoping for a more affordable price. I noticed the apartment is unfurnished, so I won't be saving any money on furniture. I also noticed the high cost of living in the city center. How about 1000 Euros instead?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your concern regarding the unfurnished apartment and city center expenses. Nevertheless, I'm reluctant to lower the price significantly. With your proposed amount of 1000 Euros, I don't want to continue the negotiation, as it doesn't meet my expectations for this prime location and property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can see where you're coming from, but I'm a student and I have a strict budget. How about we meet halfway? I'm offering 1200 Euros, which I think is a fair compromise.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: As a landlord, I must consider the investment I've made in this property and its prime location. However, given your circumstances as a student, I am willing to make a concession. If you agree to rent the apartment for 1200 Euros per month, I find it an acceptable compromise, and I agree to the price of [1200] Euro! Let us move forward with this agreement. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
